title: A Gathering Storm
description: In this Dateline classic, a Florida man is holed up in a hotel room seeking shelter from a hurricane and hiding from his past. Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally aired on NBC on February 15, 2013.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
